data.text: @KozmicPlays Good lord Koz. Donate that asap!

@KuganeGaming Right and I know each place is different but a minimum of 12" is what I keep seeing and I know the ends are scrapped at this point. I just need to do some research again and see what my options are locally. Don't give me too much credit as its all super passive to be fair 🙏

@KozmicPlays The goal is for the charity anyways, no? So with the way things are going you might be able to donate a second time at this rate! XD Plus it will make somebody happy sooner! :) Either way, really great you are doing this!
@KuganeGaming Yeah seeing my photo from last year I'm strongly considering it, absolutely no way I go a whole extra year without a cut. 😅
@KozmicPlays Maybe donate half of it now already, and donate the other half when Covid is done? It is ripe for harvesting after all! :P

This is also my obligatory remind that even if things are better for now please take caution where you can and be mindful of others. I've had to be extra careful for Bri's sake but hoping to get out one of these weekends soon 🙏Hopefully this next year is better than the last 2
